backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages contact form submissions, storing messages in a map with auto-incrementing IDs and exposing query functions to retrieve messages sorted by name or email.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the 'Email Me' mailto button feature was implemented in Contact.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key changes, serving as a reference for the portfolio's component structure and theme updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all portfolio sections (Hero, About, Projects, Skills, Certifications, Contact, Footer) with a dark Sonner toast provider.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About Me section displaying a profile image, bio paragraphs, and a highlights grid with violet/rose accent styling and an animated decorative ring.
frontend/src/components/Certifications.t: Certifications section rendering a banner image and a grid of seven certification cards with violet/rose/indigo color theming and external links.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section featuring a validated contact form wired to the backend, a prominent 'Email Me' mailto button for pranaavsanjith@gmail.com, contact info, and social links styled with the midnight-violet theme.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, smooth-scroll navigation links, and social media icons (GitHub, LinkedIn, X) for Pranaav's portfolio.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with an animated particle canvas background, gradient blobs, and CTAs linking to the Projects and About sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware active section highlighting, smooth-scroll links, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/Projects.tsx: Displays a grid of three featured projects (Customer Segmentation, Fraud Detection, GeoLocker) with thumbnail images, tech tags, and GitHub/live links.
frontend/src/components/Skills.tsx: Shows skill proficiency bars grouped into three categories (Data & ML, Frontend & Backend, Databases & Tools) plus a flat list of tech badge pills.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, AuthClient creation, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all messages, getting message count, and submitting the contact form via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on successful submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind layers, defines a midnight-violet OKLCH design token theme for both root and dark mode, and declares fade-in, spin, and float keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color tokens, portfolio-specific colors, typography/mono fonts, box shadows, border radii, and accordion keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks the current build state of R. Pranaav Sanjith's personal portfolio project, recording schema version, implemented features, known issues, architectural notes, and owner details.
